item.description: Update Jumper; INC#0684; 01:30PM; 110 Fwy x Adams Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u3NEft; University Park; Firefighters and law enforcement officers worked together to safely bring the adult male patient into LAPD custody. Firefighter-paramedics treated and transported him to the hospital. Freeway lanes are now open. Nothing further.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E210 E211 E215 E226 E26 EM1 RA15 T10 T11 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Behavioral Emergency/Jumper; INC#0684; 11:55AM; 110 Fwy x Adams Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u3NEft; University Park; LAFD is assisting CHP and LAPD with a single patient behavioral emergency (contemplating self harm?), standing precariously on an overpass above freeway lanes. Firefighters have set up the rescue air cushion on the freeway below. #LATraffic: Closure of all lanes in both directions until LAFD operations are complete (unknown duration). MOTORISTS: Expect congestion and delay. Avoid the area and consider taking an alternate route. Detours are available. Please monitor traffic reports on local news radio for more information. MEDIA: CHP Log #1375, LAPD Inc #1740.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E210 E211 E215 E226 E26 EM1 RA15 T10 T11 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0486; 09:20AM; 15803 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LEzJmc; Van Nuys; The first twenty firefighters confined the fire to one upstairs unit of a two-story garden-style apartment building, extinguishing the flames in 10 minutes from the time of alarm. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E100 E239 E290 E81 RA81 RA90 T39 T90; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0486; 09:10AM; 15803 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LEzJmc; Van Nuys; Two-story garden-style apartment building with fire showing from one second-floor unit. Offensive mode. ; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E239 E290 E81 RA81 RA90 T39 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1285; 06:55PM; 13234 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/35y8KsY; Valley Glen; Twenty-six firefighters extinguished flames in a one-story commercial building with a row of storage units in 20 minutes. The fire damaged one adjacent unit from the unit of origin. Firefighters forced entry from the front and protected the rest of the units in the row. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E89 RA81 RA889 T39 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1285; 06:35PM; 13228 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qYRche; Valley Glen; One-story row of commercials, with one unit involved with fire.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E89 RA81 RA889 T39 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1340; 06:44PM; 9660 N Texhoma Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NGAhd1; Northridge; Twenty-six firefighters defended the home and extinguished flames inside of the detached garage in 17 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E273 E290 E70 E87 RA70 RA903 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1340; 06:27PM; 9613 N Encino Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wY5OkQ; Northridge; Detached garage with fire showing, threatening a nearby home. Offensive mode.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E273 E290 E70 E87 RA70 RA903 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0328; 07:57AM; 350 N Hayworth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/36O6AWT; Beverly Grove; Firefighters coordinated their interior fire attack with vertical ventilation efforts above. It took 48 firefighters 35 minutes to extinguish the flames in an apparently vacant two-story fourplex. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E203 E226 E227 E229 E261 E27 E29 E294 E52 E58 E61 E68 E97 EA2 EM11 RA27 RA68 RA861 T26 T27 T29 T3 T61 T94 UR3; CH7; 13 15 16; Nicholas Prange
